content.question: Three long, straight wires are arranged so that they form the sides of an equilateral triangle of side length a, as shown. Each wire carries an identical current I. The wires are not in electrical contact. What is the magnitude of the net magnetic field produced by the current-carrying wires at point P, the center of the triangle?
